name: com.unity.dt.app-ui
description: App UI is a versatile and customizable UI library for Unity that provides essential building blocks for creating beautiful and responsive user interfaces. With support for MVVM architecture, state management, and localization, App UI simplifies app development while maintaining flexibility and extensibility. The library includes a wide range of UI components, design tokens, and symbols, all of which can be easily customized to fit your app's unique style and branding.

samples.description: Example of drag and drop system using App UI DropZone component and Dragger/DropTarget manipulators
Every component in a single page
Example that showcases the MVVM pattern with dependency injection
Example of state management with Redux
Example that showcases the MVVM pattern with dependency injection and state management with Redux

_upm.changelog:
### Changed

- Replaced ClickEvent action in MenuItem builder by an EventBase action

### Fixed

- Fixed styling of MenuItem element
- Fixed some SplitView styling issues when nesting SplitViews in a visual tree.
- Fixed context propoagation per key

### Added

- Added scoped service provider implementation.
- Added `showExpandButtons` property to the `SplitView` UI element.

### Removed

- Removed EventBaseExtensionsBridge class
